title: Tech Stock Futures Climb After Strong Earnings From Google Parent
sub_head: Meta, Spotify are among the companies slated to post earnings Wednesday
body:
Nasdaq futures pointed to a jump in tech stocks after Google parent Alphabet reported a surge in profit, sending its shares more than 10% higher in premarket trading.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 added 0.5%, indicating the broad-market index could extend its rally into a fourth day. It is up 2.6% so far this week. Nasdaq-100 futures rose 1.2% and Dow Jones Industrial Average futures were flat.
